Kelebihan Muatan, Truk Terguling di Jalur Tanjungsari
03 Nov 2019, 17:43 by Muhammad Wildan Pratomo


Kelebihan Muatan, Truk Terguling di Jalur Tanjungsari

KBRN,Bandung: Akibat kelebihan muatan , satu unit truk yang membawa tanah merah dari arah Sumedang menuju Bandung terguling tepatnya di Jalan Raya Tanjungsari Km 22. Minggu (03/11/19).
Menurut pantauan RRI ketika melintasi lokasi kejadian, insiden ini terjadi akibat suspensi truk tak mampu menahan bobot truk, ketika melintasi belokan tajam di Tanjung sari.
Akibat muatan yang berlebih dan truk di hadapkan dengan tikungan tajam secara otomatis truk hilang kendali dan terguling ke arah kiri jalan.Â 
Akibat kejadian ini, kemacetan arus lalu lintas tak bisa di hindarkan dan semakin memperparah arus lalulintas yang telah mengalami kepadatan sejak sore tadi.

Overloaded, Truck Overturned on Tanjungsari Line
Nov 03 2019, 17:43 by Muhammad Wildan Pratomo


Overloaded, Truck Overturned on Tanjungsari Line

KBRN, Bandung: As a result of overloading, a truck carrying the red earth from the direction of Sumedang to Bandung was rolled over on Jalan Raya Tanjungsari Km 22. Sunday (11/31/19).
According to RRI's observation when crossing the scene, this incident occurred due to the suspension of the truck being unable to hold the weight of the truck, when crossing a sharp turn at Tanjung Sari.
As a result of overloading and trucks faced with sharp turns automatically the truck lost control and rolled to the left of the road.
As a result of this incident, traffic congestion is unavoidable and further aggravates the traffic flow that has experienced overcrowding since this afternoon.
